text: Renocera is a genus of flies in the family Sciomyzidae. There are about eight described species in Renocera. ==Species== *R. amanda Cresson, 1920 *R. brevis (Cresson, 1920) *R. johnsoni Cresson, 1920 *R. longipes (Loew, 1876) *R. pallida (Fallén, 1820) *R. praetextata Müller, 1924 *R. striata (Meigen, 1830) *R. stroblii Hendel, 1900 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * ==External links== * Category:Sciomyzidae Category:Sciomyzoidea genera
title: Renocera
